Reviews.Title: I use this with my Angel Care Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: CW
Reviews.Content: I bought this to go with my Angel Care Baby Monitor and it has worked out great. You can use it as a stand or mount it on the wall. We just have it standing on the crib right now and no screws are needed, however once baby starts to stand up we will probably have to mount to the wall!

Reviews.Title: They work great!
Reviews.Author: Cabo Grupo
Reviews.Content: I originally bought two, I finally installed them, they hold the cameras very well!, They work so well that I just ordered two more to replace the other two cameras I have.If your cameras are not to big and navy, I do recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: That guy
Reviews.Content: These were good for the price and my application. Sturdy plastic. Easy to mount and adjust. I may get the extension for future use

ProductInfo.Features:
Maximum load: 1.5kg (3.3lbs)
Material: Plastic
Swivel: 360 degrees
Tilt: 90 degrees
Dimensions: 140mm (H)
ProductInfo.Name: Wall Mount Bracket for Camera (ML-500)
